title: Product Manager
skills:
Goal-oriented
Outstanding MS Office, Visio knowledge
Excellent programming skills (Golang, JavaScript, VBA, ...)
Understanding of business/stakeholder goals
Good team communication (both direct and remote)

industries.name: System Integration, Technological and Business Processes Automation, IT Consulting

experience.description:
Managing evolution of the citizen development platform Knowledge Space for creating business applications
 - Deciding on project management model
 - Interviewing potential members for development team (Golang, Angular, QA, BA, PM)
 - Hands-on developing of a part of backend features (Golang)
 - Sprint planning and day-to-day management of task priorities
 - Overviewing deployments of the platform for business clients
 - Managing user-to-development communications

Integrated Operational Planning system development project.

Creating a long-term system development roadmap
Developing product business and system architecture documents
Managing the project team (Scrum, JIRA)

Implemented functions include:
 - Functional Plans export/import (templates-to/from-MS Excel)
 - Integrated Plan Version management and workflow
 - Task management (Gantt)
 - Multiple restrictions violations check and visualisation
 - Dashboards for KPI and Production indicators

Business analysis / knowledge management:
 - Building of knowledge management practice within treasury unit
 - Knowledge elicitation
 - Business-process formalization // BPMN 2.0, Flowcharts, ER-diagrams
 - Knowledge sharing
 - Business architecture // PDCA, Archimate 3.0

IT-Product owner / architect:
 - Software design of a business-application development platform
 - Development team management (20-people team, Scrum)
 - 'Idea-to-implementation' development of software prototypes (both local and server-based)
 - Overseeing UI/UX design

Presentation of results - structuring and designing diagrams, spreadsheets and Powerpoint presentations

Key results:
 - Complete model of treasury unit business processes was formalized and is now used by employees as a guideline
 - Assets and Liabilities Operative Planning Regulations were formalized and are now being implemented
 - Wide set of knowledge management tools have been developed and is used to extract, develop and share corporate knowledge
 - 'Knowledge Space' platform is being successfully developed and implemented for an array of various business-customers (both internal and external)

industries.name: Construction of Oil and Gas Industry Facilities
